title: Honda Motorcycle and Scooter India sales rise 65 pc in June
description: In the domestic market, the sales grew 65 per cent to 3,55,560 units in June 2022 as compared with 2,12,453 units in the same month last year, it said.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
